code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import images from'utils/images';const items={speed:'Скорость',acceleration:'Ускорение',brakes:'Торможение',clutch:'Управление'};export default function VehicleShopSpec(_ref){let{model}=_ref;const[state,setState]=useState({speed:0,acceleration:0,brakes:0,clutch:0});useEffect(()=>{rpc.callClient('Vehicle-GetSpec',model).then(data=>setState(data));},[model]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"vehicle-shop_spec"},Object.entries(state).map(_ref2=>{let[name,value]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"vehicle-shop_spec-item",key:name},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:images.getImage("".concat(name,".svg")),alt:name}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"bar"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"bar_container"},[...Array(4).keys()].map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("progress",{className:"bar_part",key:item,value:value<=item*25?0:value,max:(item+1)*25}))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"bar_title"},items[name])));}));}
